blocks.name: csubma
blocks.content: Syntax for submatrices of a square matrix.

blocks.name: df-subma
blocks.content: Define the submatrices of a square matrix. A submatrix is obtained by deleting a row and a column of the original matrix. Since the indices of a matrix need not to be sequential integers, it does not matter that there may be gaps in the numbering of the indices for the submatrix. The determinants of such submatrices are called the "minors" of the original matrix. (Contributed by AV, 27-Dec-2018.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-subma(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, setvar s6) {
  |- wceq(csubma, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cmpt(s2, cfv(cbs, co(cv(s0), cmat, cv(s1))), cmpo(s3, s4, cv(s0), cv(s0), cmpo(s5, s6, cdif(cv(s0), csn(cv(s3))), cdif(cv(s0), csn(cv(s4))), co(cv(s5), cv(s2), cv(s6)))))))
  -| diffss(s5, s6)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s3, s6)
  -| diffss(s4, s6)
  -| diffss(s2, s6)
  -| diffss(s0, s6)
  -| diffss(s1, s6)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: submabas
blocks.content: Any subset of the index set of a square matrix defines a submatrix of the matrix. (Contributed by AV, 1-Jan-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm submabas(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3)), wcel(cmpo(s0, s1, c2, c2, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), cfv(cbs, co(c2, cmat, c4))))
  -| wceq(c5, co(c3, cmat, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  matbas2d(s0, s1, c2, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cfv(cbs, co(c2, cmat, c4)), co(c2, cmat, c4), c4, cfv(cbs, c4), universe, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3)))
  eqid(co(c2, cmat, c4))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, co(c2, cmat, c4)))
  sylan(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3), wcel(c2, cfn), wcel(c3, cfn))
  simpld(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, cfn), wcel(c4, universe))
  ssfi(c3, c2)
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3), wcel(c4, universe))
  simprd(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c3, cfn))
  matrcl(c0, c1, c3, c4, c5)
  syl3anc(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wcel(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cfv(cbs, c4)), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c3), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, c5)))
  3adant3(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c3))
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c3))
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  ssel(c2, c3, cv(s0))
  3adant2(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c3))
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c3))
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c3)))
  ssel(c2, c3, cv(s1))
  3ad2ant1(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, c5)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, c5)))
  biimpi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, c5)))
  eleq2i(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c5))
  matecl(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1), c0, c5, cfv(cbs, c4), c4)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c4))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, c4)
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cbs, c4)
  diff.cbs.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c2, c3)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wss.s(s1, c2, c3)
}

thm submabas(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c3)‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c2, s1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(s0[c0]s1))‚àà(Base `(c2[Mat]c4)))
  ‚ä£ c5 =(c3[Mat]c4)

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)

} = {
  matbas2d(s0, s1, c2, (s0[c0]s1), (Base `(c2[Mat]c4)), (c2[Mat]c4), c4, (Base ` c4), universe, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c3))
  eqid((c2[Mat]c4))
  eqid((Base `(c2[Mat]c4)))
  sylan(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚äÜ c3, c2 ‚àà Fin, c3 ‚àà Fin)
  simpld(c0 ‚àà c1, c3 ‚àà Fin, c4 ‚àà ùïå)
  ssfi(c3, c2)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚äÜ c3, c4 ‚àà ùïå)
  simprd(c0 ‚àà c1, c4 ‚àà ùïå, c3 ‚àà Fin)
  matrcl(c0, c1, c3, c4, c5)
  syl3anc(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c3)‚àß s0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c2), (s0[c0]s1)‚àà(Base ` c4), s0 ‚àà c3, s1 ‚àà c3, c0 ‚àà(Base ` c5))
  3adant3((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c3), s0 ‚àà c2, s1 ‚àà c2, s0 ‚àà c3)
  imp((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c3), s0 ‚àà c2, s0 ‚àà c3)
  adantl(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚äÜ c3, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí s0 ‚àà c3))
  ssel(c2, c3, s0)
  3adant2((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c3), s0 ‚àà c2, s1 ‚àà c2, s1 ‚àà c3)
  imp((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c3), s1 ‚àà c2, s1 ‚àà c3)
  adantl(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚äÜ c3, (s1 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí s1 ‚àà c3))
  ssel(c2, c3, s1)
  3ad2ant1((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c3), s0 ‚àà c2, s1 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà(Base ` c5))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚äÜ c3, c0 ‚àà(Base ` c5))
  biimpi(c0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà(Base ` c5))
  eleq2i(c0, c1, (Base ` c5))
  matecl(s0, c3, s1, c0, c5, (Base ` c4), c4)
  eqid((Base ` c4))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, c4)
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cbs, c4)
  diff.cbs.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚äÜ c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c2, c3)
  diff.wa.s(s1, c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚äÜ c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wss.s(s1, c2, c3)
}
